creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: small pouch with red drawstring; seven cluster of three beaded strands ending in fuchsia, orange or yellow tassels; embroidered panel on each side edged in colored bars (predominately maroon on one side, dark orange on opposite side); main panels embroidered in predominately maroon with zigzagging diamonds on one side and radiating double diamonds on opposite side
dimension: 5 3/4 x 5 1/16 in. (14.61 x 12.86 cm) (pouch only, without beads or drawstring)
title: Pouch
